headline: FIS Launches Optimized Reconciliation Service to Help Capital Markets Adapt to Evolving Complexity
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., August 19, 2025--FIS® (NYSE: FIS), a global leader in financial technology, today announces the launch of its innovative Optimized Reconciliation Service, a fully managed solution designed to automate the end-to-end reconciliation process for banks, corporations, and financial institutions.
